Job.Description: She will fight against other girls. Dangerous.

Gains.GainTrait: She has become pretty Tough from all the fights she's been in.
She is getting rather Aggressive from her enjoyment of combat.
She is getting rather fast from all the fighting.
Gains.LoseTrait: ${name} has had to heal from so many injuries you can't say she is Fragile anymore.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to fight during the ${shift} shift.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} was assigned to fight other girls in the arena.

Messages.Message:
As she enjoys showing off her body, ${name} lets her opponent cut away her already-skimpy clothing, ending her match all but naked - but victorious. Many of the patrons seem to enjoy the show.
As the match draws to a close, ${name} stops trying to win and simply toys with her opponent, practically torturing her in front of the audience. Many patrons disapprove, although a few respond favorably.
${name}'s verbal abuse, along with her combat prowess, lead to a dramatic defeat of her opponent, although her behavior towards the loser disappoints many patrons.
${name}'s preference for grappling and clinch-fighting throws her opponent off-balance and gives her an easy, if somewhat boring, victory.
Being able to fly is an almost-unfair advantage that most opponents can't counter. Thanks to that, ${name} wins handily.
Utilizing a no-rules, victory-at-any-cost combat style, ${name} won a decisive victory over her orthodox opponent. This was not unnoticed by some people in the audience.
${name}'s cries of joy and outright pleasure upon being injured distract her opponent, and the pain-loving girl comes back from apparent defeat to achieve a dramatic victory. Despite her many injuries, she smiles happily as she thanks her opponent for the match.
<Text Condition="skill:Magic > 50 ^ skill:Combat < 50"> ${name}'s powerful magic demonstrates precisely why mages are feared by many. She even manages to look good while doing it!
Having mastered both weapons and sorcery, ${name} is a nearly unstoppable force of nature in the Arena, easily dispatching opponents who focus on one branch of combat over the other.
${name} won her fight.

As she enjoys showing off her body, ${name} lets her opponent cut away her already-skimpy clothing, but either because of her lack of skill or just bad luck, she takes a real hit and is defeated.
${name} tries to torment her opponent, but her overconfidence leads to a stunning defeat when the other fighter feigns injury.
${name} was unable to leverage her greater maneuverability and yielded the match after being forced to the ground.
Overwhelmed by pleasure, ${name} is unable to defend herself from her opponent and is easily defeated. After the match ends, she begs the other fighter for another match - 'just like this one.'
<Text Condition="skill:Magic > 50 ^ skill:Combat < 50"> Lacking the physical prowess to hold her opponent off while she readies her spells, ${name} is quickly defeated by her opponent.
You can't believe, ${name} lost. With her skill in combat and magic you thought her unbeatable.
She lost the fight.

Message.Name: draw
Message.Text: The fight ended in a draw.
